title: You Can Have The Last Laugh | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: You Can Have The Last Laugh | Joel Osteen
description:
If you can learn to stay on the high road when someone wrongs you, at the right time, God will vindicate you. Trust Him to deliver justice, and He will release His favor and promotion over your life. 


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
